about_the_game:
About the game [/] [/]

Half-Life 2: Genry's Great Escape From City 13 is a free custom modification for Half-life 2. [/]
The game takes place a month before the events of Half-life 2. The mod is an action, with often changing locations and first-person shooter. [/]
“Do not take this mod as something serious or very high quality. The mod does not pretend to be anything” - Kirill Bulavintsev, author of the mod.
Special thanks to Maxim Belyaev and Nikita Fedorov.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, Vista, XP
  • Processor: 1.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 8.1 level Graphics Card (requires support for SSE)
  • Storage: 7000 MB available space

supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Danish, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Russian, Thai, Finnish, Swedish, Japanese
*languages with full audio support
